titles.title: Create Jobs by Expanding the R&D Tax Credit Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the credit for research expenses for 2010 and 2011 and to allow the credit to be assigned.
Create Jobs by Expanding the R&D Tax Credit Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Create Jobs by Expanding the R&D Tax Credit Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the rate of the tax credit for increasing research activities in 2010 and 2011; (2) extend such tax credit through 2011; and (3) allow certain small business concerns to assign research tax credit amounts in 2010 and 2011.
